21  public static function addRoute($path, $controller, $action = "index", $methods = null, $name = "", $cache = false, $duration = null, $requirements = [], $priority = 0) {
22  self::addRouteToRoutes ( self::$routes, $path, $controller, $action, $methods, $name, $cache, $duration, $requirements, $priority );
23  }

25  public static function addRouteToRoutes(&$routesArray, $path, $controller, $action = "index", $methods = null, $name = "", $cache = false, $duration = null, $requirements = [], $priority = 0) {
26  if (\class_exists ( $controller )) {
27  $method = new \ReflectionMethod ( $controller, $action );
28  self::_addRoute ( $method, $routesArray, $path, $controller, $action, $methods, $name, $cache, $duration, $requirements, $priority );
29  }
30  }
31 
32  private static function _addRoute(\ReflectionMethod $method, &$routesArray, $path, $controller, $action = "index", $methods = null, $name = "", $cache = false, $duration = null, $requirements = [], $priority = 0) {
33  $result = [ ];
34  ControllerParser::parseRouteArray ( $result, $controller, [ "path" => $path,"methods" => $methods,"name" => $name,"cache" => $cache,"duration" => $duration,"requirements" => $requirements,"priority" => $priority ], $method, $action );
35  foreach ( $result as $k => $v ) {
36  $routesArray [$k] = $v;
37  }
38  }
39 
40  public static function addCallableRoute($path, $callable, $methods = null, $name = "", $cache = false, $duration = null, $requirements = [], $priority = 0) {
41  if (is_callable ( $callable )) {
42  $reflectionFunction = new \ReflectionFunction ( $callable );
43  self::_addCallableRoute ( $reflectionFunction, self::$routes, $path, $callable, $methods, $name, $cache, $duration, $requirements, $priority );
44  }
45  }

71  private static function _addCallableRoute(\ReflectionFunction $reflectionFunction, &$routesArray, $path, $callable, $methods = null, $name = "", $cache = false, $duration = null, $requirements = [], $priority = 0) {
72  $result = [ ];
73  CallableParser::parseRouteArray ( $result, $callable, [ "path" => $path,"methods" => $methods,"name" => $name,"cache" => $cache,"duration" => $duration,"requirements" => $requirements,"priority" => $priority ], $reflectionFunction );
74  foreach ( $result as $k => $v ) {
75  $routesArray [$k] = $v;

79  public static function addRoutesToRoutes(&$routesArray, $paths, $controller, $action = "index", $methods = null, $name = "", $cache = false, $duration = null, $requirements = [], $priority = 0) {
80  if (\class_exists ( $controller )) {
81  $method = new \ReflectionMethod ( $controller, $action );
82  foreach ( $paths as $path ) {
83  self::_addRoute ( $method, $routesArray, $path, $controller, $action, $methods, $name, $cache, $duration, $requirements, $priority );
84  }
85  }
86  }
